modName: Fabulous Followers - 5 Redguard Girls - NO Other Mods Reqd
summary: Adds 5 followers to the game. All NPC's are 'standalone' meaning they need no other appearance mods, everything is included in this download.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WRI6q.png[/img][/center]

[b] Please note you should not need any other mods for the girls to look as the do in screenshots, and it will not conflict with any body/face mods you have in place. They should look exactly as they do in the screenshots, minus the armor, which you can find a link to at the bottom of this description![/b]

This mod introduces 5 NPC's, each with their own set of body meshes and textures, in order to give them a great look without having to go through the process of installing other mods, and to prevent their appearance from affecting other NPCs. The NPCs are female Redguards, and are designed to be followers, but you can also marry them.

[b]Aphyd, Quinn, and Raasilthe are in the White Hall in Dawnstar, and you can find Justice and Nelli in Dragon Bridge's tavern.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/dpCsV.png[/img]

[size=3][b]All Girls:[/b][/size]
[list] [*]are marked Essential[*]are Marriable [*]Auto-Level with Player [*]have different voices so travelling with all 5 is not confusing [/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/KhsGL.png[/img]
[b]I highly reccomend using a mod manager, especially NMM, to install this mod. There will be updates, and it's a lot easier to uninstall if you have problems this way.[/b]

NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download with Manager" button under the only file there.
After the mod is downloaded with NMM, activate it and load up your game. It shouldn't make too much difference where in your load order you put it.

Non-NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download Manually" under the only file there
After the mod is downloaded, unzip the 'Data" folder in the archive to your Skyrim directory. There shouldn't be any overwritten files but it will ask you to merge folders. Click "yes"

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eH4Wl.png[/img]
NMM:
Deactivate and delete the mod in NMM. Simple!

Non NMM:
Deactivate "FFRedguardGirls.esp" in your skyrim data options
In "Data" under your skyrim directory, delete the following files and folders:
FFRedguardGirls.esp
meshes/actor/character/aphyd
meshes/actor/character/ffredguardshared
meshes/actor/character/Justice
meshes/actor/character/Nelli
meshes/actor/character/Quinn
meshes/actor/character/Raasilthe
facegendata/facegeom/FFImperialGirls.esp
textures/actor/character/Aphyd
textures/actor/character/ffredguardshared
textures/actor/character/justice
textures/actor/character/nelli
textures/actor/character/quinn
textures/actor/character/raasilthe

[img]http://i.imgur.com/65ZxN.png[/img]

[size=3][color=yellow][b]Special thanks to Mayatola for helping me with the normal map issue! Our followers get along great and you know you want more gorgeous girls so go grab her mod if you don't have it already: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24664/ [/b][/color][b]

Another big thanks to Rodnix for the information on facial proportions! I may not have followed his advice to the letter, but it did give me some perspective. [/b][/size]

Also check under the "Permissions and Credits" button!

Mods Used: Puppeteer, Pinup Poser, FNIS, Unbleak ENB
